actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to allow drawbacks if imported bulk articles are exchanged for domestic articles that are used in the manufacture or production of exports.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to provide that the use of domestic merchandise acquired in exchange for imported merchandise of the same kind and quality shall be treated as the use of such imported merchandise if no certificate of delivery is issued with respect to such imported merchandise.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to allow drawbacks if imported bulk articles are exchanged for domestic articles that are used in the manufacture or production of exports.
